events.message: I received my order today but the item is broken and has multiple scratches on the surface.
The issue has been categorized as a Product Defect due to the customer's report of a broken and scratched item.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the defective product complaint.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that your product arrived damaged. I’m here to help you get this sorted out as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and any damage so we can assess the issue and proceed with a replacement?
I have attached pictures showing the scratches and the broken part near the corner as requested.
Thank you for the photos. We will send a replacement product to you immediately and arrange for the damaged item to be picked up at no extra cost.
That sounds great, thank you for the prompt response and solution. I appreciate your help.
The replacement order has been processed and the damaged item pickup scheduled. Your issue is now resolved.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your replacement product and that everything is satisfactory.
Yes, I received the replacement yesterday and it is in perfect condition. Thank you very much for your excellent support.
We are happy to hear your replacement arrived in perfect condition. We are closing this case now and remain at your service.
